name: The Dancing Robot
description:
Lore: A Gringy Old Monster annoyed by the dancing and singing of the robot sucks the power out of our Hero Mr. Cubby and scatters the notes in his field. Help Mr. Cubby regain his energy by finding the lost notes and feeding them to him.

Controls: Mouse right click to drag the notes

1-2-3-4 buttons to change camera views

Credits:

Programmers:  HybridLamma, Anemogiannis Alexandros

3D Artist, Music: Dimitris Panagiotopoulos

Audio-FX, Music: George Georgakis - Skote

Guest Appearance: GregoryNIK

PLEASE READ THE CONTROLS BEFORE PLAYING AND IF YOU LOSE A NOTE YOU MUST RESTART THE GAME IN ORDER TO WIN (THERE ARE 4 NOTES IN TOTAL)
